**Aker Solutions: Pioneering Excellence in Global Energy Solutions**

Aker Solutions stands as a preeminent global leader, delivering cutting-edge products, sophisticated systems, and comprehensive services to the dynamic oil and gas industry. Our unwavering commitment to engineering innovation, advanced design methodologies, and proprietary technology propels new discoveries into robust production, consistently maximizing recovery from vital petroleum fields worldwide. With a formidable global presence, encompassing approximately 28,000 dedicated professionals across 30 countries, we are at the forefront of shaping the future of energy.

We are actively seeking visionary individuals poised to embrace a pivotal role. More than just a position within Aker Solutions, we invite you to take a definitive stand on the complex and exhilarating challenges confronting the global oil and gas sector, both today and in the decades to come.

**Opportunity: Project Subcontracting Manager**
**Location:** Houston Office, USA

As part of our strategic global expansion and ambitious growth trajectory within the evolving subsea market, Aker Solutions is keen to onboard exceptional talent to augment our high-performing team. This is an unparalleled opportunity for a seasoned professional to significantly contribute to our strategic imperatives.

**Role Mandate:**

The Project Subcontracting Manager will assume critical stewardship over multifaceted joint ventures and complex contractual frameworks, orchestrating a spectrum of activities from sophisticated subcontract management to specialized fabrication and rigorous testing operations within diverse execution environments. This role demands a profound commitment to fostering a culture of operational excellence, continuous improvement, and unwavering adherence to the highest standards of safety and quality.

**Key Responsibilities and Strategic Contributions:**

*   **Strategic Oversight & Execution:** Provide overarching leadership for the successful delivery of joint venture projects, ensuring seamless integration of subcontracted activities and proprietary fabrication processes.
*   **Performance & Culture Catalyst:** Champion an exemplary HSE and quality mindset, driving on-time delivery, fostering collaborative synergies, and instilling a proactive, resolution-oriented approach across all project phases.
*   **Project Lifecycle Engagement:** Influence project outcomes from the foundational System Definition phase, maintaining deep engagement through Detailing, Fabrication, Assembly, and rigorous Integration Test phases.
*   **Leadership Team Integration:** Serve as an integral member of the Project Management Team, sharing joint accountability for the attainment of ambitious project objectives, including budgetary adherence, scope integrity, schedule optimization, and uncompromising quality standards.
*   **Resource & Team Orchestration:** Strategically manage all deployed resources within joint ventures and oversee multi-disciplinary subcontracting and site teams, optimizing operational efficiencies.
*   **Tender & Bid Strategy:** Contribute actively to tender teams, meticulously analyzing Invitation To Tender (ITT) documents to strategically align with client requirements for local content and comprehensive subcontracting.
*   **Contractual Framework Development:** Formulate and negotiate intricate Memoranda of Understanding (MOUs) and definitive contracts with prospective partners, subcontractors, and local suppliers, as an intrinsic part of business development, tendering, and project execution.
*   **Commercial & Financial Acumen:** Conduct astute review and meticulous analysis of subcontractor and local supplier quotations, ensuring optimal commercial terms and value alignment.
*   **Holistic Contract Management:** Exercise comprehensive contract lifecycle management with local suppliers and subcontractors, meticulously governing scope, schedule, cost, and quality parameters.
*   **Supply Chain Integration & On-Site Excellence:**
    *   Ensure the timely and precise delivery of critical product area components, including engineering documentation and hardware, for local content execution.
    *   Proactively identify and agilely resolve any project deviations or anomalies.
    *   Exercise empowered decision-making to optimize performance during construction and testing phases, driving efficiency and excellence.
    *   Verify mechanical completion at site, ensuring adherence to stringent specifications.
    *   Oversee the meticulous development of final project documentation.
    *   Orchestrate on-site activities to facilitate sophisticated system integration testing (SIT).
    *   Ensure the immediate availability of all requisite tooling for testing protocols.
    *   Guarantee the full participation of the local service base (SLS) from System Definition, ensuring seamless knowledge transfer and operational handover.
    *   Oversee the systematic organization and handling of test equipment and remaining stock at project conclusion.
*   **Scope & Commercial Governance:**
    *   Provide incisive reporting to the Project Management Core Team on all pertinent contractual or commercial issues related to subcontractors.
    *   Curate and present comprehensive lists of necessary commercial and contractual qualifications for inclusion in tenders or projects for subcontract amendments or variations.
    *   Validate that all fabrication aligns precisely with the approved design specifications.
    *   Provide expert assistance in complex claims management and dispute resolution.
*   **Time & Schedule Optimization:**
    *   Coordinate the intricate logistics of site supplies, free-issued items, and meticulously plan fabrication and testing activities to maintain critical path integrity.
    *   Provide strategic oversight to all fabrication, manufacturing, and testing activities, ensuring timely deliveries and adherence to master schedules.
*   **Quality Assurance Leadership:**
    *   Conduct rigorous reviews of quality plans for both internal and subcontracted fabrication, meticulously following up with fabrication sites to ensure impeccable implementation of quality protocols.
*   **Communication & Reporting Excellence:**
    *   Cultivate and ensure highly efficient communication channels between the project teams and manufacturing sites globally.
    *   Deliver precise and timely progress reports on all construction, fabrication, and testing activities to key stakeholders.
*   **HSE Stewardship:**
    *   Provide invaluable feedback and expert supervision on HSE plans from the nascent stages of project initiation.
    *   Coordinate and rigorously monitor HSE requirements during construction and testing phases, ensuring the consistent attainment of exemplary HSE standards.
    *   Oversee and document all on-site HSE activities, including but not limited to participation in Job Safety Analysis (JSAs), regular and ad-hoc inspections, comprehensive training for the SIT team, meticulous handling of SIT visitors, and securing photo permissions for SIT resources.

This role offers a unique opportunity to shape significant global projects within a forward-thinking organization, providing an environment for unparalleled professional growth and impact.
